Room.Name: The Barbarian Training Pits
Room.ShortDescription: You have entered the Barbarian Training Pits, where the barbarian tribes test the skills and weaknesses of their kind in live battles.
Room.LongDescription: These pits are designed for the lower level barbarians aiming to advance beyond the title of grunt. If you are seeking to rise to the level grunt second class, you should enter the yellow hut. If you are now ready to be called a grunt, first class, you should enter the orange hut, and be prepared for a good battle.
